SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sharebbs_l
id like '%'||#{word}||'%'
shtitle like '%'||#{word}||'%'
shcontent like '%'||#{word}||'%'
shcategory like '%'||#{word}||'%'

SELECT shareno, shtitle, id, shcategory, shdate, shviewcnt, r FROM ( SELECT shareno, shtitle, id, shcategory, shdate, shviewcnt, rownum r FROM ( SELECT shareno, shtitle, id, shcategory, shdate, shviewcnt FROM sharebbs_l
id like '%'||#{word}||'%'
shtitle like '%'||#{word}||'%'
shcontent like '%'||#{word}||'%'
shcategory like '%'||#{word}||'%'
ORDER BY shareno DESC ) )
where r>=#{sno} and r<=${eno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sharebbs_l(shareno,shtitle,shcontent,filename,filesize,shcategory,shdate,id) VALUES((select nvl(max(shareno),0)+1 from sharebbs_l), #{shtitle}, #{shcontent}, #{filename}, #{filesize}, #{shcategory}, sysdate, #{id})
